column4: whenever i start my computer the message come that choose any one among windows 7 or ubuntu other wise the highlightened will be selected automatically.[windows 7]. what to do to change the default os from windows to ubuntu
Download grub-customizer, you can edit the default OS u want to select through it
That would remove the GRUB screen from appearing..
GRUB is the orangle/black list of operating systems you see before you select windows or Ubutnu
You want to select Ubuntu as default OS?
: i want the same thing happening now but what i want is that . instead of window the highlight shows ubuntu. how to do that
Download grub customizer (search in software center) and run it by sudo grub-customizer
In grub-customizer click "Preferences" which would open a new window and select predefined to Ubuntu
This would answer all your questions: http://www.webupd8.org/2010/11/grub-customizer-20-can-change-default.html
thanx. are u indian. name sounds like indian
The page has instructions to Install grub-customizer and change default grub entry
